summary:
Subsurface integrator with broad understanding of petroleum geosciences. 

Diverse skills built from a varied project base. Including redetermination, brownfield production optimisation, 4D analysis, inversions, prospect analysis and drilling.

Currently working as wellsite drilling engineer in the Northern North Sea.

Successfully integrated into international teams in Australia, UK & the Netherlands to great success.  Complimented by international University experiences in the USA, Scotland & Australia.  

Looking forward to spending many more years influencing technical and commercial decisions.

First and foremost to create a social connection with the student/family to encourage an interest in geoscience.

Providing academic bridge from the professors to the students/families. 

'}]
